statement: Tone neutralization (evidence_view=neutralized) is not automated; neutralized_content must be supplied manually or evidence workflows must be implemented before scoring uses the neutralized view.
rationale: Evidence workflows are empty and insertEvidenceBatch allows manual neutralized_content.
keyAssumptions: Evidence workflows will not be implemented before MVP run
Scoring relies on the configured evidence_view
validationCriteria: Neutralized content exists for each evidence row
critiquePoints: If we switch evidence_view to raw, neutralization is no longer required
questions: Should MVP accept raw evidence instead of neutralized to reduce prep?
